mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.fund_id AS "fundId", a.nv_date AS "nvDate", a.nav AS "nav", a.add_nav AS "addNav", a.nv_rate AS "nvRate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select: select nv_date from ( select nv_date from ts_fund_nv where fund_id=#{fundId} ORDER BY nv_date desc limit 1 ) t ORDER BY nv_date asc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_fund_nv( fund_id, nv_date, nav, add_nav, nv_rate, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{fundId}, #{nvDate}, #{nav}, #{addNav}, #{nvRate}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_fund_nv SET fund_id = #{fundId}, nv_date = #{nvDate}, nav = #{nav}, add_nav = #{addNav}, nv_rate = #{nvRate}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
